Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Thorndale. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Thorndale. 

Bus shuttle service is available from Howard to Bryn Mawr to provide connecting service.  Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hwy and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hwy and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.
